description:
After the 24th Israeli Knesset (parliament) fell apart in 2022, new legislative elections are scheduled for November 1, 2022. In spite of his ongoing legal battles, ex-prime minister Benjamin Netanyahu continues to serve as Chairperson of Likud. Should Likud win a majority, it is likely Mr. Netanyahu will become the next Prime Minister of Israel.

This market will resolve to "Yes" if Benjamin Netanyahu becomes the next Prime Minister of Israel. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

If a rotation government is established as the next government of Israel, this market will only resolve to "Yes" if Mr. Netanyahu is the first prime minister to serve in that rotation government.

Any interim or acting prime minister will not count toward the resolution of this market.

If the next Prime Minister of Israel is not instated by December 31, 2023, 11:59:59 PM ET, this market will resolve 50-50.

The primary resolution source for this market will be official information from the government of Israel (e.g. https://m.knesset.gov.il/en/mk/pages/elections.aspx), however other credible reporting may be used.

markets.question: Will Netanyahu be the next Prime Minister of Israel?

title: Will Netanyahu be the next Prime Minister of Israel?
